overview: Famous and fabulous, these rhymes have been ringing for aeons. Impish little children eating sugar, pie and trotting about in their yard are a few scenes that are bound to ring a bell. That is what rhymes depict a childhood of fun and frolic. There are a few counting out rhymes in this series as well... Counting can be exciting if there is a song to go with it. Play the entire series to know more.
title: Famous Nursery Rhymes
